article.title: Lockheed Modernizes Missile Software for United Arab Emirates
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Grand Prairie, Texas, was recently awarded an $18 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract.Â The award will provide for PATRIOT Advanced Capability-3 software modernization development for the United Arab Emirates. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
